title: How to lengthen my college essay without ruining it - Quora

response.answer_text: ‘Extend my essay’ activities are not too complicated to do without removing any other parts of it with the help of several tips that can be found in the guides for such purposes.  You can use several types of technique that can be applied for such aim, for instance: add several extra information that is rather useful for your essay or any of its parts;describe anything new or anything more specific for the lengthening of your text;there is no necessity to ruin the work without adding the new information from different points of view, just describe a lot of other types and minds.After all, the possibility to add anything new to your essay will not ruin your paper for the university or college if you thought earlier in such a way. There are several approaches that are ready to provide you the possibility to add your own paper and to be sure in it.

To lengthen your essay without ruining it you simply need to come up with more information on the topic and think of another arguments to support your point of view. You can also try to lengthen your sentences, but it’s a tricky way because if you’re not an expert in essay writing you might simply overload it with not-relevant information. Here are also simple steps to follow: Divide into paragraphsInclude long quotesAvoid acronymsAdd to the endExtend your headingsWrite out numbersElaborateYou can also check this site: How to Extend an Essay. Firstly, you’ll be able to find helpful tips from experts.
